mapper.sql: team_number, operate_index, supplier_count, supplier_employee_pk, supplier_cost, final_supplier_cost, supplier_product_name, people_count, pick_date, pick_type, picker_cellphone, send_type, create_user, update_user, pk, send_date, status, land_day, picker, off_day, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into product_order_operation
team_number,
operate_index,
supplier_count,
supplier_employee_pk,
supplier_cost,
supplier_product_name,
people_count,
pick_date,
pick_type,
picker_cellphone,
send_type,
create_user,
update_user,
pk,
send_date,
status,
land_day,
picker,
off_day,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update product_order_operation
team_number = #{team_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_index = #{operate_index,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_count = #{supplier_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_employee_pk = #{supplier_employee_pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
supplier_cost = #{supplier_cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
final_supplier_cost = #{final_supplier_cost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
supplier_product_name = #{supplier_product_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
people_count = #{people_count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pick_date = #{pick_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pick_type = #{pick_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picker_cellphone = #{picker_cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_type = #{send_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR},
send_date = #{send_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
land_day = #{land_day,jdbcType=INTEGER},
picker = #{picker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
off_day = #{off_day,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pk = #{pk,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select A.team_number, A.operate_index, A.supplier_count, A.supplier_employee_pk, B.name AS supplier_employee_name, A.supplier_cost, A.final_supplier_cost, A.supplier_product_name, A.people_count, A.pick_date, A.send_date, A.pick_type, A.picker_cellphone, A.send_type, A.create_user, A.update_user, A.pk, A.create_time, A.update_time, A.status, A.picker, A.land_day, A.off_day from product_order_operation A LEFT JOIN supplier_employee B ON A.supplier_employee_pk = B.pk where A.team_number = #{team_number,jdbcType=CHAR} ORDER BY A.operate_index
